uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions

Class SnapshotTakenCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.MediaPlayerEventAdapter
      • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.Condition<String>
        • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions.SnapshotTakenCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaPlayerEventListener

    public class SnapshotTakenCondition
extends Condition<String>
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it has finished taking a snapshot.
